Html:
First of all, congratulations for a great great idea and job.

Second, I am not clear about if I must have Office installed in the machine where you are deploying your project. I am considering an ASP.NET application. Should I have Microsoft Office installed in the server or could I just copy some dlls in bin folder?

Thank you very much.

hello there,

using office in your application means you have to install ms office of course. no registering or something like that required.
of lot of nice codeplex projects offers you to deal with office files without an installed office.

sebastian

Hello,

    For netoffice requires MS office to be installed in web server ? I have no MS office installed in the web server.

Thanks!

hello,

netoffice requires an installed office in any version.
for web server development try ClosedXML or othter Codeplex projects.(requires office2007 or higher)

sebasian
